summary: This document outlines the policy and operational procedures for the Americas Region Reputational Risk Committee at Deutsche Bank. It details the identification of legal entities involved in transactions, the management of reputational risks, and the structure of quarterly meetings to review risk profiles and trends.

persons.name: Jeff Mayer
persons.context: Jeff Mayer is mentioned as the business head for CB&S who must provide pre-clearance for proposals before they are reviewed by the ARRC.

persons.name: Leslie Slover
persons.context: Leslie Slover is identified as the business manager for CB&S and acts as an alternate in the context of the ARRC meetings.

keyFacts: The document outlines the procedures for the Americas Region Reputational Risk Committee at Deutsche Bank.
Jeff Mayer is required to provide pre-clearance for all CB&S proposals before they are reviewed by the ARRC.
Leslie Slover serves as the alternate business manager for CB&S in the context of the ARRC.
Quarterly meetings are held to review the regional reputational risk profile and trends.
The Secretary is responsible for maintaining minutes and periodic reports for the committee.
